languages.text: "Славная охота, эттфатер. И добычей, и висой я доволен!"
"Fine hunting, Aett-Vater. The prey and the verses have me well pleased!"
languages.original_text: "Славная охота, эттфатер. И добычей, и висой я доволен!"

traits.locale_text: "Fine hunting, Aett-Vater. The prey and the verses have me well pleased!"
"Fine hunting, Aett-Vater. The prey and the verses have me well pleased!"
"Fine hunting, Aett-Vater. The prey and the verses have me well pleased!"
"Fine hunting, Aett-Vater. The prey and the verses have me well pleased!"

languages.text: “狩猎愉快，狼领！无论是猎物还是诗句，都让我非常满意！”
languages.original_text: "Fine hunting, Aett-Vater. The prey and the verses have me well pleased!"

traits.locale_text: “狩猎愉快，狼领！无论是猎物还是诗句，都让我非常满意！”

languages.text: 「いい狩りだった、アエット＝ヴァテル。この獲物と詩には大満足だ！」
languages.original_text: "Fine hunting, Aett-Vater. The prey and the verses have me well pleased!"

traits.locale_text: 「いい狩りだった、アエット＝ヴァテル。この獲物と詩には大満足だ！」

languages.text: «Bien cazado, Aett-Vater. ¡La presa y los versos me han dejado más que satisfecho!».
languages.original_text: "Fine hunting, Aett-Vater. The prey and the verses have me well pleased!"

traits.locale_text: «Bien cazado, Aett-Vater. ¡La presa y los versos me han dejado más que satisfecho!».

languages.text: « Ce fut une belle chasse, aett-vater. Aussi bien la proie que les vers m'ont apporté satisfaction ! »
languages.original_text: "Fine hunting, Aett-Vater. The prey and the verses have me well pleased!"

traits.locale_text: « Ce fut une belle chasse, aett-vater. Aussi bien la proie que les vers m'ont apporté satisfaction ! »

languages.text: "Eine gute Jagd, Aett-Vater. Beute und Verse haben mir sehr gefallen!"
languages.original_text: "Fine hunting, Aett-Vater. The prey and the verses have me well pleased!"

traits.locale_text: "Eine gute Jagd, Aett-Vater. Beute und Verse haben mir sehr gefallen!"

languages.text: "İyi avdı Aett-Vater. Av ve mısralar beni çok memnun etti!"
languages.original_text: "Fine hunting, Aett-Vater. The prey and the verses have me well pleased!"

traits.locale_text: "İyi avdı Aett-Vater. Av ve mısralar beni çok memnun etti!"
